results.name: Number of prime factors of 10^n - 1 (counted with multiplicity).
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..322
S. S. Wagstaff, Jr., Main Tables from the Cunningham Project.
S. S. Wagstaff, Jr., The Cunningham Project
formula: Mobius transform of A085035 - _T. D. Noe_, Jun 19 2003
a(n) = Omega(10^n -1) = Omega(R_n) + 2 = A046053(n) + 2 {where Omega(n) = A001222(n) and R_n = (10^n - 1)/9 = A002275(n)}. - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jun 09 2006
results.author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 2000
